title: Tower Health on LinkedIn: Fact: Long-term side effects of COVID-19 vaccines are extremely unlikely....
description: Fact: Long-term side effects of COVID-19 vaccines are extremely unlikely. Serious side effects that could cause a long-term health problem are extremely...
cleaned_text: side effects of COVID-19 vaccines are extremely unlikely. Serious side effects that could cause a long-term health problem are extremely unlikely following any vaccine, including COVID-19 vaccines. Years of research and vaccine safety monitoring show that side effects after six weeks are exceedingly rare (Source: [Centers for Disease Control and Prevention](https://www.linkedin.com/company/centers-for-disease-control-and-prevention?trk=public_post-text)). You can find vaccine distribution sites by searching [vaccines.gov](http://vaccines.gov?trk=public_post-text), texting a home zip code to 438829, or calling
